title: 254: What the Hand Does the Mind Remembers
itunes:title: What the Hand Does the Mind Remembers
description: Robert Kiyosaki talks about how he voluntarily got into Vietnam, how he almost got kicked out, and why he wrote his Capitalist Manifesto to combat Marx’s manifesto.
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
